DataElement.preferredName: Seminal Vesicle Tumor Cell Invasion Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of local spread of prostate tumor cells through infiltration or destruction of seminal vesicle tissue.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to local spread of malignant neoplasm by infiltration or destruction of adjacent tissue in the saclike glandular diverticulum on each ductus deferens in a male individual.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (SEM-in-al VES-ih-kulz) Glands that help produce semen.

Concepts.definition: One of the two paired glands in the male genitourinary system, posterior to the bladder and superior to the prostate gland, that produces fructose-rich seminal fluid which is a component of semen. These glands join the ipsilateral ductus deferens to form the ejaculatory duct.

Property.preferredDefinition: Local spread of a malignant neoplasm by infiltration or destruction of adjacent tissue; for epithelial neoplasms, invasion signifies infiltration beneath the epithelial basement membrane.

Concepts.definition: The local spread of tumor cells of a malignant neoplasm through infiltration or destruction of adjacent tissue; for epithelial neoplasms, invasion signifies infiltration beneath the epithelial basement membrane.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
